NAME: Fundacja Twoja Rola / Manufaktura Sitowie Gardens
DESCRIPTION: Twoja Rola Foundation, led by Wojciech Żak, developed a 2,000-square-metre urban farm called the Manufacture of the Sitowie Garden. Drawing on the experience and support of the Sitowie Estate project, this initiative integrates urban farming with occupational activation and horticulture therapy for the project's beneficiaries.The primary focus of the farm is cultivating crops such as cucumbers, beetroot, and Chinese cabbage, which serve as the base ingredients for the farm’s organic preserves. The foundation specializes in the production of fermented foods, including beetroot sourdough, pickled cucumbers, kimchi, naturally fermented vegetables, and black garlic. Additionally, the farm offers fresh, seasonal vegetables depending on the harvest, such as tomatoes, green beans, courgettes, kale leaves, and nasturtium flowers and leaves. This case could help us to explore the impact of the urban farm on local food systems, social rehabilitation, and its contribution to promoting sustainable urban agriculture.
